website_summaries.verdict: The top drill press available. "Wouldn't consider using another drill press again," is a typical comment among the customers we surveyed.
pros: It has all the features and does everything the other drills in our ratings can, but it is bigger, more rigid, more durable, and has greater capacities
cons: On the higher end of the price range, but its durability may end up saving you money in the long run

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to all of the reviews. It's crap.
customer_reviews.text: I should have trusted the reviews. This is a horrible product. The spindle twisted permanently about a month and a half after buying it during normal use. I called Delta to get help with it and he told me it was user error. It wasn't. It's just crap steel. Everything was on the right speed setting. So now customer service is telling me to take it to a service provider 20 miles away like it's a hand held tool I can throw in the truck and take off. I won't be buying any more Delta tools. The company is on its way out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: ... rack teeth was stripped out called amazon they were great refunded some of the money but defiantly expected more ...
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this and starting to put together noticed top of belts was cracked then later in the day I noticed the bolt on top of the rack teeth was stripped out called amazon they were great refunded some of the money but defiantly expected more especially when spending owner a grand
customer_reviews.author: J9

customer_reviews.title: I got what I paid for and I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Pros) I did my homework and for the price it had all the features I wanted. It was fairly easy to put together. It's solid, and it's accurate. Cons) Somewhere a small allan was lost and a small washer (easy to replace, so no big deal) The big one is it is not made in the U.S.A. and worst of all it is made in China!. All in all I really like it. It would really be nice if everything had a "Made in" as part of the description.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: ... with the Delta 18-900L Drill Press because of the good reviews on it as opposed to the more expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: I went with the Delta 18-900L Drill Press because of the good reviews on it as opposed to the more expensive Powermatic, which had some bad reviews. The Delta18-900L uses an old school belt drive but it works flawlessly and changes speeds easily. The LED light along with the dual lazer make the Drill Press very easy to use. The Drill Press Table is large and rotates 90 degrees if needed. The Drill Press depth adjustment is awesome and it has a long quill travel of up to six inches. I am very happy with this Drill Press.
customer_reviews.author: coolreed

customer_reviews.title: Seven Years and no Problems
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this unit for 7 years and still love it. Speed change is a snap. The laser crosshairs make centering the bit a cinch. The light is great. The adjustments for depth are a dream, super accurate and reproduceable all day long. I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Ultra smooth, precise
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for precision, very smooth, little vibration. Able to change drill speed quickly with adjustable belts. Drill speed index comes printed on motor bonnet. Sets up quite easily. Will definitely need help mounting motor head to shaft. Very heavy, high quality press
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Wilkey

customer_reviews.title: Solid performer.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this drill press to my wife for a birthday present. Assembly was easy, BUT REALLY DOES require a second person to lift the head into place. What impresses me is the solid build quality of the whole unit. BTW, my wife is totally impressed with the tool she has wanted for years.
customer_reviews.author: Peregrine Smith

customer_reviews.title: The drill was pretty easy to set up with easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: The drill was pretty easy to set up with easy to follow instructions. A second person is invaluable when setting the head. The laser needed a little bit of adjustment which isn't unexpected after being shipped. Everything worked beautifully. The speeds are easy to change. All in all, I am extremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Buying machinerybon Amazon is a gamble. I bought one of these a year ago and it was great. I bought another and it was obviously a refurbished one. The pulley kept popping off. They sent s replacement so we'll see how this one fares.
customer_reviews.author: Fedupwithkids

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product - Delta did a great job.
customer_reviews.text: I read a few reviews of this Drill Press, and was unsure about the purchase. Ultimately, I decided that there were more good reviews than bad. It took about 30 minutes to assemble it, and I'm completely happy with the Delta. I think it's a great balance between an old bench Drill Press it replaced, and an expensive, heavy duty commercial Drill Press.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Seedman

customer_reviews.title: Industrial shop
customer_reviews.text: I have zero complaints. It has worked perfectly, with less than a hour of run time a day, for almost 2 years. For the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad machining by Delta and bad customer support by CT Power Tools
customer_reviews.text: The drill press column and base do not align. The bolt holes in the base are seriously off-center. Bad QAQC by Delta. To make matters worse CT Power Tools will not return emails or calls so I can't warranty the parts.
customer_reviews.author: charles madeley

customer_reviews.title: Husband Happy
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new drill. He is very happy with the laser in it to line up his work. He says "it is spot on!" I don't know what more to say. I don't use it. BUT I can tell you if my husband is pleased, it must be good. He would be the first to point out ANYTHING he did NOT like, and he has had nothing but compliments about this drill press!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Moffett

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but where is the quality control?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over the Powermatic because I am so happy with my Unisaw. Product went together fine but during the first use I noticed the quill travel hung up about half way thru. Upon investigating I found a big hunk of steel torn out of the quill near the long key way. Seems when this material void travels into the base of the machine it causes the quill motion to stop. Now I have to take apart the heaviest part of this machine and take it into a Service Dealer. Not happy at all. I thought about outfitting my shop with other Delta tools, but not any more.
customer_reviews.author: Aka3

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: Very delighted with this machine. Excellent workmanship and design reflects obvious input from users. The whole experience including shipping and packing was excellent. By far the best value of available options. If I discover any negatives, I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and sturdy. Worked well even for drilling 2 1/2" holes in the end grain of cedar. It's heavy and tough. Worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Dydie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT drill press. I have been giving it a workout!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G. Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: Delta Drill Press
customer_reviews.text: This is one beffy drill press. If your looking at the cheap 100.00 to 300.00 drill presses forget it. Spend the extra money and but this one, you won't regret it. Everything on it says quality compared to the others. Smooth running, the led light is nice, the lazer is spot on and changing the speed is easy. The trucking company dropped it off at my home and used a pallet jack to put it right in my garage for me. The assembly was simple but make sure you have some help lifting the head onto the pedestal. Also remember free shipping from Amazon.com. Everything about this purchase was good.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This performs above my expectations. I needed the longer quill stroke and this one is powerful and delivers what I needed. I would have given 5 stars if the crossed lasers were a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis McManaman

customer_reviews.title: Was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time as indicated. Was very easy to put together. High quality machine at a competitive price. Will shop thru Amazon again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fine piece of equipment, very straight drill, easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Great Drill Press!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this drill press. So easy to use! When I opened the hood and saw all the belts and pulleys I was a bit intimidated. But when I needed to change them (as it comes set at the slowest speed) I was amazed out how easy it was!! The lasers do not seem to be very accurate for me and I do not use them. But the drill press itself is very well made and I very much recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: the power is very strong and the Laser light is still working good. I love it
customer_reviews.text: The Drill Press is very accurate and after 3 months of experience, the power is very strong and the Laser light is still working good. I love it.

customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The platform could go slightly lower (hard to get a long bit on a large piece). Other than that, fine.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ruged piece of machinery

customer_reviews.title: Disgusted.

customer_reviews.title: Don't want to get a delta... buy it anyway
customer_reviews.text: Yes its delta. Parts are awful to find. Customer service is marginal. But....... notice 5 stars. It is a very accurate drill press. Wide range. Great torque. customer_reviews.text: Great drill press. Didn't have any issues with setup and the chuck doesn't have any runout. It's really easy to switch between speeds and the light/laser are helpful in certain situations. Highly recommend. Got great reviews according to Fine Wood Working.

customer_reviews.title: Drill Press
customer_reviews.text: This is an unimaginable drill press. It exceeds all expectations. However, 2 STRONG people are needed for its assembly! It is heavy.

customer_reviews.title: Delta 18-900L review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Delta after also looking at the Powermatic. I have owned it for about four years with one problem. The casting on the quilt needed attention. Other than that it has been great. Gave up on the rebate after 8 months calling Delta.

product_meta.title: Delta 18-900L 18-Inch Laser Drill Press
product_meta.description:
The Delta 18-900L 18 in. Laser Drill Press features a rugged design for professional use. Ideal for woodworking, it's designed to provide the accuracy and precision you need to get the job done right the first time. It boasts a heavy-duty motor for powerful performance and an auto-tensioning belt drive system for effortless speed changes. An LED lamp illuminates the work surface for enhanced visibility and adjustable laser lines intersect to mark where the drill bit will descend into your workpiece. The accurate Class IIIA laser is built with a high quality less than 5mw laser that operates with precision cross hairs that mark the drilling point.



AMAZON.COM
Rugged and versatile enough for professional use, the DELTA 18-900L 18-Inch Laser Drill Press features a heavy-duty motor for powerful performance, and an Auto-Tensioning Belt Drive System for effortless speed changes. Designed to provide the accuracy and precision you need to get the job done right the first time, this tool is ideal for woodworking.



18-Inch Laser Drill Press
At a Glance: * Provides a full 16 drilling speeds (170 - 3,000)
   
   
 * Full 6-inch quill stroke for best-in-class capacity
   
   
 * Oversized woodworker's table bevels 0-90 degrees left and right
   
   
 * Dimensions: 20 by 70 by 28 inches (W x H x D); 5/8-inch key chuck capacity
   
   
 * Backed by a five-year warranty

This professional-grade drill press is ideal for woodworking with a wide range of soft and hard woods. View larger.16 Speeds for Drilling in a Variety of Materials
Precision drilling is easy with the DELTA Laser Drill Press. It features sixteen speeds for optimal drilling performance in various materials. The rack-and-pinion height adjustment on the oversized woodworker's table is easily raised and lowered to the desired height. The adjustable locking levers allow for easy angle adjustments to the table top while the bright TWINLASER helps provide drilling accuracy every time.Auto-Tensioning Belt Drive System for Efficient Performance
The 18-900L is unique among other drill presses because of its time-saving Auto-Tensioning Belt Drive System, which ensures fast, easy speed changes while maximizing transmission efficiency with consistent belt tension and motor alignment.

6-Inch Quill Stroke and Best-in-Class Capacity
With a full 6-inch quill stroke, the 18-900L allows for deeper drilling or industrial applications and best-in-class capacity.

Robust Motor and Over-Sized Table for Power and Versatility
Powered by a 3/4-horsepower induction motor, the 18-900L can easily take on demanding applications. Its oversized worker's table features a patented design and bevels 0-90 degrees left and right, tilts forward 0-48 degrees. The unit has T-slots for clamping, and a removable/replaceable center insert for through-the-table drilling.

Precise, Accurate, and User-Friendly
The 18-900L also features micro-adjustable depth stops and an independent depth scale, which allows the user to zero the scale and set up for repetitive drilling in just seconds. At the same time, an LED light illuminates the work surface for visibility, and the non-tip cast iron base provides maximum stability.

Warranty Information
The DELTA 18-900L 18-Inch Laser Drill Press is backed by a five-year warranty.

What's in the Box
18-Inch Laser Drill Press with oversized table, and manual.
